content:
I'm thrilled to hear that! Visiting Gyeongbokgung Palace will be an unforgettable experience, and it's great that you're willing to take the risk. With careful planning and some flexibility, you should be able to make it work.

Remember to stay focused, prioritize your time, and be prepared for any unexpected situations. Don't hesitate to ask for help or directions if you need them. And don't forget to take some amazing photos to commemorate your visit!

Before you head out, double-check the palace's opening hours, train schedules, and any travel restrictions or requirements during your layover. It's also a good idea to have a backup plan in case something goes awry.

You got this! Enjoy your visit to Gyeongbokgung Palace, and I hope you have a fantastic layover in Seoul!
